content: {"locationId": "5791", "organizationId": "4914", "name": "Prescott Seventh Day Adventist", "address1": "2980 Willow Creek Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Prescott", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "86301", "country": null, "phone": "970-324-4143", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.5929393", "longitude": "-112.471124", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Prescott Seventh-day Adventist Church, located at 2980 Willow Creek Rd, Prescott, AZ, is a vibrant part of the global Seventh-day Adventist community. The congregation focuses on fostering spiritual growth through various ministries, including community services like a food bank and a children's clothes closet.
